author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Finally
review:
Opening;

Bat-mite is a character who has appeared in direct to DVD Lego  DC film's for years so this is great to get now .

The Minifigure-

The figure has a very nice exclusive cowl mould with one bent ear the face has the cartoony eyes and buckteeth the cape is a small Batman cape in blue the torso has appropriate and accurate printing the legs are a very nice triple moulded piece .

The accessory -

Accessories include an incredible detective comics no27 Batman first appearance this will be worth a lot in years time , the stand is the plain cmf stand , a 1×2 black jumper plate and the action pose piece which works well for other figures but not this one as his legs are not poseable .

In conclusion-

this my favourite figure from my third favourite cmf series as a DC fan I would 100% recommend this to any other people who share my passion for it or just want that epic Accessory .

author: Odeinoichus
title: Batman's #1 Fan!
review:
Set #71026 Bat-Mite: Welcome the last member of the team. Batman's #1 Fan, Self-Proclaimed, and a thorn in everyone's side. This particular Imp from a Paralle Dimension can cause my issues, as seen in the LEGO DC Special Be-Leagured.

Bat-Mite has some very nice parts. He has a custom costume with bat symbol sewn on, a loose fitting utility belt, a short soft-cloth cape, a cowl with one bent ear and triple-moulded short legs. He includes a printed tile piece which features a copy of Detective Comics #27 on it, the first appearance of Batman (which coincidentally is also in this series). Overall I'm impressed with Bat-Mite, he looks very close to the 3-D model introduced in the animate special. My one complaint are with the hands, I'm not sure if they suffer from being made of a softer material, but mine have stressed a bit from holding the comic tile in his hand.

Recommended.
